title: Calories in Corona Beer
meta_description: Learn calories in beer corona for a standard 12 oz bottle, plus carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations like light versions.
assumptions: Standard Corona Extra, 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle, 4.6% ABV, no lime or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by beer type (Extra, Light), serving size, brand batch, and temperature; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz bottle of Corona beer contains 148 calories, mostly from carbs and alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Corona beer?
faqs.a: About 148 kcal for a standard 12 oz bottle of Corona Extra.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Corona beer?
faqs.a: Approximately 13.9 g of carbs per 12 oz bottle, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Corona beer have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 1.2 g protein and 0 g fat per bottle.

faqs.q: Calories in Corona Light vs. regular?
faqs.a: Corona Light has 99 kcal per 12 oz, lower than regular's 148 kcal.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Corona beer?
faqs.a: Low at 25 mg per 12 oz bottle.
